data_frame.destination_panidentifier: uint16 (optional, present if Destination Addressing Mode is nonzero)
data_frame.destination_address: uint16 | uint64 (optional, present if Destination Addressing Mode is nonzero)
data_frame.source_panidentifier: uint16 (optional, present if Source Addressing Mode is nonzero and Intra-PAN is 0)
data_frame.source_address: uint16 | uint64 (optional, present if Source Addressing Mode is nonzero)
